name: Harsh Kumar
title: Software Engineer
description: Backend engineer passionate about building scalable systems and solving real-world problems through clean, efficient code.
tagline: I build reliable systems with Golang, Python, and C++.
bio: I'm a backend engineer with a strong focus on system design and automation. At Airtel Digital, I’ve led critical projects involving distributed systems, retry mechanisms, and ERP integrations. I thrive in performance-critical environments and love designing scalable architectures.
bioExtended: Beyond my professional work, I enjoy participating in hackathons, building open-source projects, and continuously sharpening my problem-solving skills. I’m currently exploring low-level development and AI systems while refining my understanding of cloud-native architectures.

highlights.title: Hackathon Winner
highlights.description: Won multiple hackathons including SIH 2022, Innovate for India, and HackHC (Best AI Hack).

highlights.title: Open Source Builder
highlights.description: Creator of Edi – a terminal-based text editor written in Go, and contributor to projects like Neer and Drowsiness Detector.

highlights.title: Leadership Experience
highlights.description: Held leadership roles at NIT Kurukshetra including Secretary of ELAD and Management Head of the Alumni Association Student Body.
